name: Starlink: uprising
description:
Make space great again!

Welcome to the starlink project, where you can control your own satelite! Of course it is not yours, but you can rent it :)

Controls

W/A/S/D - Movement

Q/E - Rotate left/light

(Hold) left mouse - shoot laser/rocket

Mouse wheel (in game mode)- Zoom

B - go to the build mode

Mouse wheel (in build mode) - Rotate an object
